src:
Girangnya Matthijs De Ligt Jadi Pahlawan Kemenangan Juventus
03 Nov 2019, 07:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Perasaan gembira tidak bisa disembunyikan oleh Matthijs De Ligt. Bek Juventus itu merasa gembira karena bisa membawa timnya menang di Derby Della Mole dini hari tadi.
Dini hari tadi, Juventus bertamu ke markas Torino. Mereka menantang tetangga mereka itu di pertandingan Giornata ke 11 Serie A.
Pada pertandingan ini, Juventus dibuat kerepotan dengan aksi spektakuler Salvatore Sirigu yang terus menerus mematahkan peluang mereka. Namun di menit 70, gawang eks kiper PSG itu akhirnya jebol berkat aksi De Ligt.
De Ligt merasa gembira bisa menghantarkan timnya menang di partai Derby ini. "Tentu saja saya sangat bahagia," ujar De Ligt kepada DAZN.

Baca komentar lengkap sang bek di bawah ini.
text:
His character Matthijs De Ligt Becomes the Hero of the Victory of Juventus
Nov 3, 2019, 07:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Feelings of joy cannot be hidden by Matthijs De Ligt. The Juventus defender feels happy because he could bring his team to win at the Derby Della Mole this morning.
Earlier today, Juventus visited the Torino headquarters. They challenged their neighbors in the 11th Giornata match in Serie A.
In this match, Juventus were troubled by the spectacular action of Salvatore Sirigu who kept breaking their chances. But in the 70th minute, the former goalkeeper PSG was finally broken thanks to the action of De Ligt.
De Ligt was pleased to be able to deliver his team to win in the Derby party. "Of course I'm very happy," De Ligt told DAZN.

Read the full defender's comments below.
